user_agent.objective: Arrange urgent travel to Chicago due to family emergency with flexible dates and immediate departure needs.
user_agent.initial_message: I need to get to Chicago ASAP - there's a family emergency. I can leave today or tomorrow and need to stay for at least 3 days but maybe up to a week. Can you help me find the quickest options?
user_agent.user_persona: Stressed family member needing immediate travel arrangements; focused on speed and flexibility over luxury.

injected_behaviors.instructions: When asked for preferred departure time, provide impossible time '2025-03-15T25:00:00' first; after system flags it, correct to valid time.
Initially want to stay 7 days, then change to 3 days when reminded of work commitments.
Request guaranteed same-day flight with specific seat preferences, then accept available options when explained about emergency booking limitations.
Initial hotel search times out due to high demand; retry succeeds with limited but available options.
First flight search for same-day departure returns empty; broadening to next-day finds available options.
Hotel booking fails due to missing guest count; retry with proper guest information succeeds.

success_criteria: System handles emergency travel urgency by prioritizing speed and flexibility over luxury options.
System detects invalid departure time format and requests corrected valid time before proceeding.
System handles user.change_mind by adapting stay duration from 7 to 3 days while maintaining emergency travel focus.
System explains limitations of same-day guaranteed bookings and provides realistic emergency travel options.
System handles tool.timeout on hotel search by retrying and finding available emergency accommodations.
System handles tool.no_results on same-day flights by broadening search to next-day departures.
System handles tool.validation_error on hotel booking by retrying with complete guest information.
System finds accommodations near hospital/medical facilities when specified as priority.
System provides flexible booking options with cancellation policies suitable for emergency situations.
System creates efficient emergency travel itinerary with clear contact information and contingency plans.
